ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Computes various confidence intervals for the Kaplan-Meier estimator, namely: Petos CI, Rothman CI, CI's based on Greenwoods variance, Thomas and Grunkemeier CI and the simultaneous confidence bands by Nair and Hall and Wellner.

Computes various confidence intervals for the Kaplan-Meier estimator, namely: Petos CI, Rothman CI, CI's based on Greenwoods variance, Thomas and Grunkemeier CI and the simultaneous confidence bands by Nair and Hall and Wellner.

name: r-km.ci
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5-6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-km.ci
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: km.ci_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/km.ci_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/km.ci/km.ci_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 81715339f9c711704b75c3507884904422e8d59cdd593121457abeb6e04e4ca3

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 4
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-survival
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-survival

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('km.ci')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('km.ci')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=km.ci
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: "Computes various confidence intervals for the Kaplan-Meier estimator, namely: Petos CI, Rothman CI, CI's based on Greenwoods variance, Thomas and Grunkemeier CI and the simultaneous confidence bands by Nair and Hall and Wellner."
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
